    This class deals with scanning a QR code and identifying which event to navigate to.
    UserEvent
    This class represents the UserEvents that get retrieved from Firestore that users can join and create.

    This class handles displaying the events properly in the view on the homepage Events are formatted and provide navigation functionality to a specified events detail view.
